pullRequest.title: OAuth Scim Service - Fixed Issue #976 - accountStatus value is returned as null for auto sign-in scenario
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed Issue #976 - accountStatus value is returned as null for auto sign-in scenario
Added integration tests for the code changes.
Renamed autoLoginOrReturnLoginPage() to redirectToLoginOrConsentPage()

commit.message:
Added ACCOUNT_STATUS_COOKIE for auto signin

Added ACCOUNT_STATUS_COOKIE for auto signin

Added integration tests to validate the account status cookie
